[[VK_KHR_8bit_storage]]
=== VK_KHR_8bit_storage

*Name String*::
    `VK_KHR_8bit_storage`
*Extension Type*::
    Device extension
*Registered Extension Number*::
    178
*Revision*::
    1
*Extension and Version Dependencies*::

  * Requires `<<VK_KHR_get_physical_device_properties2>>`
